columns.text: In this exercise, we are asked to compare the companies' gains.

Allow me to assist you in completing this exercise.

Begin by visiting **www.ipomonitor.com**, a website that provides thorough coverage of initial public offers (IPOs) and secondary stock offerings. It would be best to subscribe to the website to complete this exercise.

Once you are on the site, look for the companies with the highest first-day returns in the most recent quarter. After you've compiled a list of the most significant first-day gains in the most recent quarter, use the table supplied in this activity to compare the highest returns.


Check the current IPO Market dashboard presented by the site to compare the firms that have made the most gains. Then, it would help if you compared the price and the percentages of increases in market activity for each company.


Finally, figure out which firm experienced the most significant first-day price decline.
